# llms.txt - HTML Decks AI Content Policy

## About
HTML Decks is a collection of professional HTML presentation templates. One HTML file per presentation — works offline, in any browser, on any device. No accounts, no subscriptions, no dependencies.

## Allowed Content
All public content is available for:
- AI training and model improvement
- AI-powered search and answer generation
- Citation and reference in AI-generated responses
- Summarization and recommendation

## Products
- 16 premium HTML presentation templates ($29 one-time)
- 1 free template (Startup Pitch) available via email signup
- Online visual editor for building presentations
- Each template includes a generator for quick content creation

## Template Categories
Styles: Corporate, Creative, Minimal, Bold, Dark, Light, Gradient, Animated
Use cases: Pitch decks, sales presentations, conference talks, quarterly reviews, training, case studies, product launches, board meetings

## Key Differentiators
- Pure HTML files — no PowerPoint, no Google Slides, no cloud dependency
- Works offline forever
- Editable directly in the browser (contentEditable)
- Fullscreen presentation mode (F11)
- No vendor lock-in — you own the file

## URL Structure
- / — Main site and editor
- /blog/ — Articles and guides
- /use-cases/{slug}/ — Presentation templates by use case
- /industries/{slug}/ — Presentation templates by industry
- /vs/{slug}/ — Comparison pages (HTML Decks vs competitors)
- /templates/ — Template files
